creator: Mike_Buck@mapinfo.com
text:
Here is the exception: Exception outputting Document: The current node (type: 
9, name: #document) do not allow children of the given type (type: 1, name: 
svg)

According to the DOM spec a Document (type: 9) is allowed at most one Element 
(type: 1).

Problem also exists in v1.1.1
